name: node-api-server-starter
description: Api server boilerplate with Node.js and TypeScript

scripts.db:create: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/createDatabases.js
scripts.db:migrate: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/migrations.js
scripts.db:seed: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/seeds.js
scripts.db:create:test: NODE_ENV='test' yarn run build && NODE_ENV='test' NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/createDatabases.js
scripts.db:migrate:test: NODE_ENV='test' yarn run build && NODE_ENV='test' NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/migrations.js
scripts.db:seed:test: NODE_ENV='test' yarn run build && NODE_ENV='test' NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/seeds.js
scripts.start: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/index.js
scripts.dev: NODE_PATH=./app nodemon --watch app node app/index.js && yarn run start
scripts.secret: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/createSecretKeyBase.js

author: AtaruOhto
